analysis.description:
Reentrancy in WWAMCrowdsale.assignBountyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#844-858):
	External calls:
	- bountyWeiAmount = WWAMPricingStrategy(pricingStrategy).tokensToWei(tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#845)
	- totalBountyWeiAmount = WWAMPricingStrategy(pricingStrategy).tokensToWei(bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#845-848)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bountyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#856-858)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#415-429):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#423-427)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#427-428)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#349-404):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#355-371)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#371-374)

	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#389-393)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#388-389)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#48-57) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#349-404):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#355-371)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#371-374)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#546-577) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#561-576)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/11/0x59a048d31d72b98dfb10f91a8905aecda7639f13.sol#556-576)
